changeSet.sql: UPDATE stretchy_report SET report_sql = "SELECT dt.loanId AS 'Nro Solicitud', dt.productName AS 'Producto', dt.fundName AS 'Origen de Fondos', dt.groupId AS 'Nro Grupo', dt.groupName AS 'Nombre Grupo', dt.agencyName AS 'Agencia', dt.approvedPrincipal AS 'Monto Otorgado', dt.outstandingPrincipal AS 'Saldo Capital', dt.repaidPrincipal AS 'Capital Recuperado', dt.repaidInterest AS 'Intereses', dt.totalRepaid AS 'Total Cobrad' FROM ( SELECT mg.id AS groupId, ml.id AS loanId, mpl.name AS productName, mg.account_no AS groupNo, mg.display_name AS groupName, COALESCE(ma.name, 'N/A') AS agencyName, IFNULL(ml.approved_principal, 0) AS approvedPrincipal, IFNULL(ml.principal_outstanding_derived, 0) AS outstandingPrincipal, IFNULL(ml.principal_repaid_derived, 0) AS repaidPrincipal, IFNULL(ml.interest_repaid_derived, 0) AS repaidInterest, IFNULL(ml.principal_repaid_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.interest_repaid_derived, 0) AS totalRepaid, mf.name AS fundName FROM m_office mo INNER JOIN m_office office_under ON office_under.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(mo.hierarchy, '%')AND office_under.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') INNER JOIN m_client mc ON office_under.id = mc.office_id INNER JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = mc.id INNER JOIN m_product_loan mpl ON mpl.id = ml.product_id INNER JOIN m_group mg ON mg.id = ml.group_id LEFT JOIN m_group center ON center.id = mg.parent_id LEFT JOIN m_portfolio mp ON mp.id = center.portfolio_id LEFT JOIN m_supervision ms ON ms.id = mp.supervision_id LEFT JOIN m_agency ma ON ma.id = ms.agency_id LEFT JOIN m_fund mf ON mf.id = ml.fund_id WHERE (ml.submittedon_date BETWEEN '${submittedOnStartDate}' AND '${submittedOnEndDate}') AND(ml.fund_id = '${fundId}' OR '-1' = '${fundId}') AND (ml.loan_status_id = 300) GROUP BY ml.id ORDER BY mg.id )dt" WHERE report_name = "Reporte Grupal de Cobranzas y Saldos por Financista";

changeSet.sql: UPDATE stretchy_report SET report_sql = "SELECT dt.loanId AS 'Nro Solicitud', dt.productName AS 'Producto', dt.fundName AS 'Origen de Fondos', dt.clientNo AS 'Codigo Cliente', dt.clientName AS 'Cliente', dt.groupNo AS 'Nro Grupo', dt.groupName AS 'Nombre Grupo', dt.agencyName AS 'Agencia', dt.approvedPrincipal AS 'Monto Otorgado', dt.outstandingPrincipal AS 'Saldo Capital', dt.repaidPrincipal AS 'Capital Recuperado', dt.repaidInterest AS 'Intereses', dt.totalRepaid AS 'Total Cobrad' FROM ( SELECT mg.id AS groupId, ml.id AS loanId, mc.account_no AS clientNo, mc.display_name AS clientName, mpl.name AS productName, COALESCE(mg.account_no, 'N/A') AS groupNo, COALESCE(mg.display_name, 'N/A') AS groupName, COALESCE(ma.name, 'N/A') AS agencyName, IFNULL(ml.approved_principal, 0) AS approvedPrincipal, IFNULL(ml.principal_outstanding_derived, 0) AS outstandingPrincipal, IFNULL(ml.principal_repaid_derived, 0) AS repaidPrincipal, IFNULL(ml.interest_repaid_derived, 0) AS repaidInterest, IFNULL(ml.principal_repaid_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.interest_repaid_derived, 0) AS totalRepaid, mf.name AS fundName FROM m_office mo INNER JOIN m_office office_under ON office_under.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(mo.hierarchy, '%')AND office_under.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') INNER JOIN m_client mc ON office_under.id = mc.office_id INNER JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = mc.id LEFT JOIN m_product_loan mpl ON mpl.id = ml.product_id LEFT JOIN m_group_client mgc ON mgc.client_id = mc.id LEFT JOIN m_group mg ON mg.id = mgc.group_id LEFT JOIN m_group center ON center.id = mg.parent_id LEFT JOIN m_portfolio mp ON mp.id = center.portfolio_id LEFT JOIN m_supervision ms ON ms.id = mp.supervision_id LEFT JOIN m_agency ma ON ma.id = ms.agency_id LEFT JOIN m_fund mf ON mf.id = ml.fund_id WHERE (ml.submittedon_date BETWEEN '${submittedOnStartDate}' AND '${submittedOnEndDate}') AND(ml.fund_id = '${fundId}' OR '-1' = '${fundId}') AND (ml.loan_status_id = 300) AND ml.group_id IS NULL GROUP BY ml.id ORDER BY mc.id )dt" WHERE report_name = "Reporte por Clienta de Cobranzas y Saldos por Financista";
